overview: Brother George and Martin Koppeheli (Avenue Music), the authors are popular among fans of multichannel music, and not just a series of Ambra, represent a new project - "Lichtmond" ("Moonlight"). The visual part is the animation Spanish cartoonist Diego M. Bonati, Studio Imago-D - fantastic worlds created specifically for "Lichtmond".
title: Lichtmond - Moonlight
